text: Feli fellow bollywood actor rishi kapoor
his family a friendly with the cons
tweeted the Kapoor's are with the cons
in their difficult time time is the
biggest healer god bless Indian actor
and producer ritesh deshmukh also
tweeted his support saying not
commenting on court's verdict he said
but my heart goes out to Salman Khan
large-hearted and one of the finest
people I've met in this industry however
though also those who thought the
verdict was the right one this case just
proves that Indian judiciary can delay
but can't deny facts twitted Vinita a
little hope on the system restored and
this from Pankaj Gupta I am a fan of
Salman Khan but my faith in judiciary
has been restored by this verdict no
guilty shall go scot-free
